charts: SELECT COUNT(*) total ,SUM(IF( a.age_value >=70 AND age_unit='Years'  ,0,1)) eligible, SUM(IF( a.assignedto IS NOT NULL,1,0)) assigned, SUM(IF(b.deathId IS NOT NULL, 1,0)) completed FROM death a LEFT JOIN deathDetail b ON a.deathId=b.deathId WHERE areaId<700

SELECT COUNT(*) va_complete ,DATE(starttime) DATE  FROM death a LEFT JOIN deathDetail b ON a.deathId=b.deathId WHERE  a.assignedto IS NOT NULL AND b.deathId IS NOT NULL AND DATE(starttime) > SUBDATE(DATE(NOW()),30) and DATE(starttime) <= DATE(NOW()) GROUP BY DATE(starttime) order by DATE(starttime)

select sum(if(b.deathId is null,0,1))  va_progress,sum(if(b.deathId is not null,0,1))  va_pending,a.areaId from death a  left join deathDetail b on a.deathId=b.deathId where a.areaId<700 and assignedto is not null group By a.areaId;
select count(*) complete_interviews,b.assignedto from feedback a left join death b on a.deathId=b.deathId where areaId<700 group by b.assignedto
Avg Narrative Length in chars (Higher the better)
select  FLOOR(avg(length(summary))) avg_narrative_length,surveyor from narrative a left join death b on a.deathId=b.deathId where surveyor is not null and areaId<700 group by surveyor

select FLOOR(avg(timestampdiff(MINUTE,b.starttime,n.timelog))) avg_time_in_min,a.surveyor from  deathDetail b left join death a on b.deathId=a.deathId left join narrative n on b.deathId=n.deathId where areaId<700 and timestampdiff(MINUTE,b.starttime,n.timelog)<300 group by a.surveyor
VA Interviews with No Symptoms(Lower the better)

select sum(if(instr(summary,'\"')=0,1,0)) va_interviews_with_no_symptom,surveyor from positiveSymptoms a left join death b on a.deathId=b.deathId where surveyor is not null and areaId<700  group by surveyor
SELECT COUNT(*) deaths_by_area, areaId  FROM death where areaId<700 GROUP BY areaId
SELECT COUNT(*) va_interviews_assigned,assignedto  FROM death a LEFT JOIN deathDetail b ON a.deathId=b.deathId WHERE  a.assignedto IS NOT NULL and a.areaId<700  GROUP BY assignedto
VA Interviews assigned but not Completed (Lower the better) by surveyor

SELECT COUNT(*) va_interviews_pending,assignedto  FROM death a LEFT JOIN deathDetail b ON a.deathId=b.deathId WHERE  a.assignedto IS NOT NULL and a.areaId<700 AND b.deathId IS NULL GROUP BY assignedto
VA Interviews assigned but not Completed (Lower the better) by area
SELECT COUNT(*) va_interviews_pending,a.areaId  FROM death a LEFT JOIN deathDetail b ON a.deathId=b.deathId WHERE  a.assignedto IS NOT NULL and a.areaId<700 AND b.deathId IS NULL GROUP BY a.areaId
